concept.title: Accuracy of the standardized uptake value

li.p: The standardized uptake value (SUV) is intrinsically variable. Please pay more attention to this while explaining and using the SUV. Lots of factors, such as the physical quality of patients, glucose level, scanning parameters, reconstruction parameters, VOI shape and size, may influence the SUV calculation.
SUV is not the most important factor for interpreting and analyzing PET/CT images and cannot be used as the exclusive criteria.

While performing quantitative comparison to the quality of PET/CT images, make sure that all the interferences brought by the above factors have been eliminated. In addition, take the measurement error of SUV into account.
